Alphah::

Alphah arrived where Cyndro was, she had been running and now she was 
breathing heavily "What's happened?" asked the femme to Cyndro



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: Yup Yanhosh, My maximals Alphah and Staice are there in 
maximal 
> city
> 
> Attilla/Luzbel
> 
> Luzbel look a shadow and walked towards Panzar"Come Attilla I found 
> something!!!!"
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Panzer::
> > 
> > She saw the bots land and croutched behind a large boulder.   Her 
> > black matte body finish wouldn't shine, so it wouldn't attract 
> > attention.  In panther mode,she layed as close to the ground as 
> > possable and stayed perfectly still. If she could avoid a 
> > confrontation, she would. With luck, they would mistake her for a 
> > shadow and move on.  If not, she'd fight to the death.  One thing 
> she 
> > couldn't stand, was preds. She'd normally fight a pred and win. 
> But, 
> > out numbered, she was at a disadvantage. Best thing to do was 
wait 
> > and see what happened.
